metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7700 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in wasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::visitCall in wasm-binary.cpp in Binaryen 1.38.22. A crafted wasm input can cause a segmentation fault, leading to denial-of-service, as demonstrated by wasm-merge.

criterions.comment: binaryen package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
